CANTCONNECT: Lavalink node not connected, for now the music command is disabled
NOTINVOICE: you need to join a voice channel.
NOARGS: you need to give me a URL or a search term.
NOTSUPPORT: Playlists are not supported with this command.
ERRORPLAY: there was an error while searching: {{error}}
NOMATCH: there was no tracks found with that query.
